title: Total synthesis of bicyclomahanimbine by Cu(II)-promoted photoredox process
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,30110-30115
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05863A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Shilpa Dangar, Tiyasa Roy, Suman Noskar, Alakesh Bisai
Total synthesis of bicyclomahanimbine has been disclosed via a late-stage Cu(II)-mediated Photoredox process. The use of Cu(OTf)2 played crucial roles in controlling reaction outcomes and maximizing yields.
